Job Posting: 178328 - Position: S26 Application Developer/Programmer Co-op Intern 178328B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/20/2026 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 02/13/2026 02:39 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Proofpoint 892 Ross Drive Sunnyvale Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State 94089 CA JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2026 - Summer S26 Application Developer/Programmer Co-op Intern 178328B Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 or 8 months To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Job Description About Us: Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Proofpoint is a global leader in human- and agent-centric cybersecurity. We protect how people, data, and AI agents connect across email, cloud, and collaboration tools. Over 80 of the Fortune 100, 10,000 large enterprises, and millions of smaller organizations trust Proofpoint to stop threats, prevent data loss, and build resilience across their people and AI workflows. Our mission is simple: safeguard the digital world and empower people to work securely and confidently. Join us in our pursuit to defend data and protect people. Opportunity available here: Careers Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: Careers Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
